mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_reply (bno, reply_text, replyer, reg_date, user_name) VALUES (#{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, NOW(), #{username})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply_text, replyer, r.user_name, r.reg_date, r.update_date FROM tb_reply r, tb_user u WHERE r.replyer = u.user_id AND bno=#{bno} ORDER BY reg_date DESC
